attributes.action: Extend the Eat Out Help Out scheme until end of 2020
attributes.additional_details: Extending the scheme will help relevant business sustain a good revenue stream with  high number of customers secured during the past couple of months ( utilising the scheme in question) and help the people enjoy time away from everyday responsibilities and everyday stress especially with the in certainty Around Covid_19, this is a win win situation for everyone involved including the government.
attributes.background: The extension of the Eat Out Help Out scheme is necessary amid the current circumstances the people and business are going through.
